description:
This course is designed for small business owners with little to no experience with building websites. During this course you will learn the steps required to create and customize a website from scratch using Wordpress. During the course you will work along with me as I, install Worpdres, setup a template for my website, add features to my website, add products to sell on my website.

At the end of this course you will have a website that has been tailored for your business, and the skills to build as many new websites as you want in the future. If you would like to get your business online but don't have the budget to hire a professional web design agency, then this course is right for you.
title: How to Build a Website for your Business using Wordpress
